thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: What’s the Deal

author: wsjcom
title: What’s the Deal
text:
MANHATTAN Houghton Expands Park Avenue Lease Publisher Houghton Mifflin Harcourt Co. has almost tripled the amount of space of its initial lease at 3 Park Ave., after acquiring a business unit this year.
Over the past several months, the company negotiated additional lease amendments with the building’s owner, Cohen Brothers Realty Corp., adding floors 21, 23 and 24, for a total of 102,000 square feet, Houghton Mifflin Harcourt said. The publisher signed a lease in December to take 35,000 square feet on the 19th and 18th... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
